title: How to Make a Pumpkin Smoothie

steps.headline: Prepare the pumpkin.
steps.description: Cut the top off of the pumpkin. Scoop out all the seeds with an ice cream scoop.

steps.headline: Bake.
steps.description: Cut the pump in half, bake with sliced sides down in a shallow pan at 375 degrees for 1.5 hours, or microwave on high for 7 minutes per pound. You can also cut up into cubes and boil - this makes it unnecessary to peel a raw pumpkin - a very difficult process.

steps.headline: Make the smoothie.
steps.description: Scoop out cooked pumpkin.Throw them into the blender with the milk, apple cider, and other spices and ingredients for more taste.

steps.headline: Pour in a cup.
steps.description: Pour yourself a cup, curl up next to your fireplace (or at least a fireplace screen saver), and enjoy!

text: Prepare the pumpkin. Cut the top off of the pumpkin. Scoop out all the seeds with an ice cream scoop. Bake. Cut the pump in half, bake with sliced sides down in a shallow pan at 375 degrees for 1.5 hours, or microwave on high for 7 minutes per pound. You can also cut up into cubes and boil - this makes it unnecessary to peel a raw pumpkin - a very difficult process. Make the smoothie. Scoop out cooked pumpkin.Throw them into the blender with the milk, apple cider, and other spices and ingredients for more taste. Pour in a cup. Pour yourself a cup, curl up next to your fireplace (or at least a fireplace screen saver), and enjoy! Finished.
